newsitem.title: SPAIN: Albino gorilla celebrates 30 years in Spanish zoo.
newsitem.headline: Albino gorilla celebrates 30 years in Spanish zoo.

text.p: Thousands of people flocked to Barcelona's zoo on Friday to celebrate the 30th anniversary of the arrival of its star attraction, an albino gorilla named Copito de Nieve (Little Snow Flake).

Taking advantage of a public holiday, hundreds of families visited Copito, whose gifts included a two-metre (six-foot) high birthday cake and a football signed by the players of the Barcelona football club.
